name: Chuck'n Chicken
description:
Arrows to move.

Up to float.

X to lay an egg

Z to pick up object

Z to thrown held object

Space to hatch egg.

You are a chicken far from home. You'd like to get home.

Or at least, get one of your many descendants home...

Chuck'n Chicken is a puzzle platformer created for the Godot Wild Jam #28.

You play as a chicken who can only float for just a couple seconds. But, you can lay eggs that you can throw. And when you hatch an egg, a new chicken pops out! At the cost of the original chicken's life.

Try to get to the end of each level!
